title: Building a Content and E-Commerce Platform on Top of MarkLogic
abstract: De Gruyter has chosen to consolidate all content, e-commerce, and marketing websites into one platform. The new De Gruyter Online has real-time integration with our ERP and title management system, with our logistics and fulfilment systems, and with our content warehouse and CMS. We are using MarkLogic Server as content repository for catalogue and content data, storing journals, books, major reference works, and databases in one database. This allows us to present "one face to the customer" for all types of products, to offer more flexible, granular, and contextualized usage of our content, and  to further standardize and automate processes, resulting in a highly scalable and robust solution for our e-business.
